user_request: Show the shopping cart on amazon. Add "macbook air" to the cart on amazon
screen_desc: This screenshot shows a mobile web browser with a list of visited websites. The top bar displays the search/address bar where the user can enter a URL or search terms. Below, there are links to different shopping and e-commerce websites like Newegg, Amazon, eBay, and Best Buy, each with an icon and website description. The user can interact with these links or open new pages. At the bottom are standard navigation buttons for back, home, and menu options.
history_actions: click on the "Chrome" browser app icon located at the lower right part of the screen.
click on the browser's address/URL bar located at the middle and top part of the screen.
